author: mrglavas
msg: Reduce the cost of reset(). If we end up having to read from the component manager more than once make sure that we use a cached default value for the SchemaDVFactory if one was not explicitly provided. This eliminates repeated calls to SchemaDVFactory.getInstance() which can be very expensive.

author: hansbak
msg: added a selenium option to webtools which partially tests if all settings have been done and will now automatically download the selenium server. Sponsored by Antwebsystems, programmed by employee Gan
